dict.acceptation: 加强，巩固；勉励，激励；增加…的艺术效果；（价格）上涨；

sent.orig: The introduction a BI would therefore strengthen the position of employees; it would strengthen their bargaining-power.
sent.trans: 基本收入的导入，将加强雇工的地位、加强他们议价的力量。

sent.orig: Fire: burning soul, strengthen the flame guard, strengthen technique and throwing flames flames.
sent.trans: 火：燃魂、强化火焰守护、强化烈焰术和投掷火焰。

sent.orig: Strengthen environmental protection and punish: Strengthen system and constituent management.
sent.trans: 加强环境保护和整治：加强法制及组织治理。

sent.orig: Effectiveness: Strengthen skin's hydration. Well keep moisture. Strengthen the ability of skin oxidation and postpone senility.
sent.trans: 功效：补水保湿滋润、增强肌肤抗氧化能力，延缓衰老，令肌肤营养色泽，通透、水嫩、健康本质。

sent.orig: Further strengthen the brand image, actively participate in social activities, to strengthen and community ties.
sent.trans: 进一步强化品牌形象，积极参与社会公益活动，加强和社会的密切联系。
